text: Hatina kutumira mutumwa, asi kuti ateererwe nekuda kwaAllah. Asi dai vakave (vanonyepera), apo pavakazvidzvinyirira pachezvavo, vanouya kwauri (Muhammad (SAW)) vachikumbira ruregerero kubva kuna Allah, uyezve mutumwa akavakumbirira ruregerero, zvirokwazvo dai vakawana Allah vari vanoregerera zvikuru, vane tsitsi zhinji
